p: GC-MS chromatogram of the peel extract is illustrated in Table 2, incorporating the retention time and area of bioactive components present. Among those bioactive components, 1,2,3,4-butanetetrol (33.22%), Dimethyl sulfone (20.47%), 9-octadecenamide (13.14%), and Pentadecanoic acid (6.62%) were reported as the major compounds.
